bibl.title: The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997. (Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4.)
bibl.note: JORDAN David R., Hugo MONTGOMERY and Einar THOMASSEN (Edd.), The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997. (Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4.)
